s.text: It attempts to avoid the stale dismissive clichŽ "talking heads," but sometimes, in a hurry, does refer to the breed, with simple dignity, as "the heads."
But what is the best collective noun for people who make their living spouting opinions in one medium or another (or, as is increasingly the case, in all of them)?
In case Pundit Central whets your appetite instead of sating it, the page includes an extensive set of links to Web sites where the pundits and panjandrums can be found in their full glory.
